title: Chhandamtu hmangaihna mak leh
lyrics:
Chhandamtu hmangaihna mak leh
Chanchin lawmawm fak rawh u;
A ropuina la zual zel tur,
Chatuana sang deuh deuh tur.

Lal Isua hmangaihna fak r'u,
Fakna ri zawng zawngte chuan;
A hmangaihna mak tak hianin,
Khawvel hi khat thuai rawh se.

Chuti-ang hmangaih nasa,
Ka aiin a thi ta a;
Hnam tinin hla leh thinlungin,
A thihna i fak chiam ang.

Thahnemin i Tlantu fak rawh,
Fak la, fak lehzual fo rawh;
Ram tina mi chhiar sen lohten,
Krista hmangaih an hriat nan.
